channel.title: Post your nooby recoloured models here
channel.description:
[size=11pt][font=verdana]Well this board is getting flooded with recoloured armour and skills capes that require no skill at all. So I made this thread for people to post them on.[br]Once you post them Ill quote you and edit it into this topic. Sound good?[/font][/size]
[i][size=8pt][font=verdana]Not sure if this will get locked but I'll give it a try. Cba to wait for a response from a mod.[/font][/size][/i] [quote="Invader Killer"]Invader Killer http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy213/Invader_Killer/Zarusmageset.jpg http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy213/Invader_Killer/bootsandgloves.jpg http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy213/Invader_Killer/cape.jpg http://i793.photobucket.com/albums/yy213/Invader_Killer/platebody.jpg[/quote]

Why would you do this?[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“revengr, post:17, topic:342945”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=439347.msg3237377#msg3237377 date=1276584574]

I HAVE NO NOOBY RECOLORED MODELS MUAHAHA! ya but really why arent people posting recolors?

dont encourage them pl0x
[/quote]Recolors are the point of this thread.
We want them to post here so they don’t wind up in their own thread in the models section…[/quote]

you failed to get my point, he was wondering why nobody was posting recolors, thats a good thing, we want the recolors number to be very small

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:342945”][quote author=drawgornot link=topic=439347.msg3233332#msg3233332 date=1276273600]
are these animated?
[/quote]

Try em and find out.

Also, please have a mod clean spam/none models here.

@Drawgornot, ask the model maker.
[/quote][quote author=krackkid link=topic=439347.msg3233688#msg3233688 date=1276302045]

Also, please have a mod clean spam/none models here.

@Drawgornot, ask the model maker.

OMNFG OFMG OMG THERE IS SPAM, JUST LIKE EVERY OTHER TOPIC ON MOPARSCAPE!, GO GO GO MODS CLEAN THEM!

I already did, twice, it was perfectly legible till your posts…[/quote]
Well if they are not animated then you can do it:D.

OFF topic: CJ, how long do you think it would take to remove all the spam on mopar :D?

Read full topic

item.title: Post your nooby recoloured models here
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Invader Killer, post:6, topic:342945”][quote author=revengr link=topic=439347.msg3229870#msg3229870 date=1275947040]
Are you releasing those models?
Some of them are actually pretty good.
The boots you posted would be excellent replacements for Dragon Boots.
I’d prefer the cape without wings though, and the platebody is a dragon platebody isn’t it?
[/quote]Yes it is…but i took off the arms like the dragon chain body.
I will try to delete the wings. And the cape goes to the ground. I posted a download link for my models. I don’t think the magic set is in there…

OMG SOME ONE A REAL PERSON SAID MY MODELS ARE GOOD!!! ;D ;D
I found the arm models for my Zarus robe top, and they don’t fit when I insert them… PLEASE HELP
Here’s one of my swords. CREATED BY ME NOT RELEASED YET. I will release if you want me to
[/quote]

You may put that one in a topic of it’s own if you like, as it is not a recolour as I can see.

Read full topic

Here’s one of my swords. CREATED BY ME NOT RELEASED YET. I will release if you want me to

item.source: Post your nooby recoloured models here

item.title: Post your nooby recoloured models here
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

if(i == 2438){ class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.aString170 = "Overload potion(1)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "1 dose of overload potion.".getBytes(); } if(i == 2448){ class8.anIntArray160[0] = 13111; class8.aString170 = "Extreme ranging(1)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "1 dose of extreme ranging potion.".getBytes(); } if(i == 2450){ class8.anIntArray160[0] = 127; class8.aString170 = "Extreme strength(1)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "1 dose of extreme strength potion.".getBytes(); } if(i == 2428){ class8.anIntArray160[0] = -32424; class8.aString170 = "Extreme attack(1)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "1 dose of extreme attack potion.".getBytes(); } if(i == 2432){ class8.anIntArray160[0] = 10198; class8.aString170 = "Extreme defence(1)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "1 dose of extreme defence potion.".getBytes(); } if(i == 2452){ class8.anIntArray160[0] = -32046; class8.aString170 = "Extreme magic(1)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "1 dose of extreme magic potion.".getBytes(); } if(i == 2430){ class8.anIntArray160[0] = -27314; class8.aString170 = "Recover special(1)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "1 dose of recover special potion.".getBytes(); }

Perfect recolors for the new high level herblore potions from RuneScape.
I only did the full potions and renamed them to 1-dose, because that’s the way I wanted them on my server.
Per request I can do all 4 doses for each potion if you want.

Read full topic
